data.text: @fickeryest I figured it out -- Charmed is produced by CBS. I thought all of them were WB, but that explains it, they need a certain # of CBS shows.
@dtissagirl It really was. She was kind of weird, just not in the adorable-weirdos unite-let’s-be-friends-way

@dtissagirl There was a woman who moved in down the hall from me a few years ago. She kept inviting me over to watch her Charmed DVDs every time she saw me - she was weirdly specific about what we’d be watching. I can’t hear the name now without remembering her tbh 👀
@poetgirl925 Yeah, same, I have very little interest, but a couple of my RL friends were OBSESSED with the original, so I know everything that happened ever. LOL.
@fickeryest It makes no sense. I read a Pedowitz interview that he made it sound like it was between a SPN spinoff and a TVD/Originals spinoff, but hi you can have two spinoffs and less reboots?
@dtissagirl Hahaha he kind of is. I only watched the first Charmed sporadically so I’m not super attached to it, but this reboot looks bad
@poetgirl925 I think he's supposed to be Leo, but he's more like Walmart Giles from Buffy?
@dtissagirl I just watched the trailer - it felt weirdly like a Charmed/Charlie’s Angel crossover. Like, who is that dude dropping exposition bombs? 🤔
